description: This file defines the VideosRowAdapter class, a RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of Video objects in a horizontal row, optimized for Android TV interfaces. It manages focus visuals, keyboard input handling, and progress overlay display for each video item.

classes.name: VideosRowAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView.Adapter implementation that provides views representing Video items in a horizontal scrolling list, handling focus visuals, key events, and progress overlays.

classes.name: VideosRowAdapter.VideoVH
classes.description: ViewHolder class for individual video items, managing UI elements like thumbnail, title, overlay, and progress indicators.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and returns a new ViewHolder for a video item.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data from a Video object to the ViewHolder UI elements, sets up focus and key event listeners, and updates progress display.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of video items.

methods.name: setFocusedIndex
methods.description: Updates the index of the currently focused item and refreshes the list display.

methods.name: applyFocused
methods.description: Applies or removes focus visual styling on a video item.

methods.name: bindProgressPercent
methods.description: Updates the progress overlay based on the given percentage.
